body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Fort Frederica National Monument: Visitor Center open 9:00 am to 5:00 pm seven days a week; gates to the park and parking area are closed at 5:00 pm.Bloody Marsh Unit:  Open 8:30 am to 4:00 pm seven days a week.Park Closings:November 25th (Thanksgiving)December 25th (Christmas Day)January 1st  (New Year's Day)Call: 912-638-3639 for updates on operating hours and emergency closures
title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
